#################################################

System Requirements:
Processor: Pentium - 700MHz or better
RAM: 128MB
DirectX Version: 7.0 or above
Keyboard and Mouse: Supported
Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Deluxe_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Get ready for the ultimate adventure as you unearth your inner bookworm. Help Lex battle the biggest threat the Great Library has ever known in Bookworm Adventures! Can you perform enough wordy wonders to vanquish tons of villains? Boost your word power with sparkling gems, potions, and treasures. Conquer exciting mini-games and brilliant bonus modes. Experience the superior test of vocab valor ... find fun inching through classic literature in Bookworm Adventures!
